title: 03/03/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/03/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why Tom Brady doesn’t have to retire from the NFL anytime soon after winning his 7th Super Bowl. He gives praise to Cardinals quarterback Kyler Murray and argues it’s time to buy in on Murray as a great player in the league right now. Plus, he talks to Nick Wright from First Things First about Dak Prescott and what will end up happening with his contract this off season with the Cowboys.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
